description: This file defines the UtilityPaymentService class, which provides methods for handling utility payment operations such as processing a utility payment request and reading payment records. It integrates with a repository, REST client, and mapper components to perform its functions.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentService
classes.description: A service class responsible for processing utility payments and retrieving payment data, utilizing Spring's @Service annotation for component registration and Lombok for constructor injection and logging.

methods.name: utilPayment
methods.description: Processes a utility payment request by saving an initial record, calling external REST client for payment processing, updating the record with success status and transaction ID, and returning a confirmation response.

methods.name: readPayments
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of utility payment DTOs using the repository and mapper.
